entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
